content.rendered: Our long sausages bring authentic Polish flavors appreciated by everyone. The reduced amount of fat and salt leaves you worry-free – you can indulge yourself with this delectable snack and not feel heavy! All our sausages perfectly complement the meat platters, match warm fresh bread or bun sandwich, and are an excellent ingredient for many warm dishes, such as quiche, pastas, roasts, or one-pot fusions.
